QuestData.Title: The Fate of Val'sharah
QuestData.Description: Malfurion, my love.... My heart breaks for him, but I cannot follow where he goes.$b$bI have sworn myself to Elune, my goddess, to defend her temples and lands with all that I am. I cannot stand by while my order is in danger.$b$bMay she keep you in her graces, Malfurion.$b$b<Tyrande turns away, eyes glistening with tears.>
QuestData.RewardText: This shall be remembered as one of the darkest days in the history of our world. But hope remains. Elune's light has strengthened our resolve.
